Starring:

Tania Russof, Nikki Anderson (aka Nikky Andersson), Shonna Lynn, Angelica Mirai, Gina, Ana (aka Aniko Harnal, Lisa Moneli), Mafalda, Regina Sipos, Sandra Dark, Bianca, Judith Penn.



Scenes:

Disc 1:

Scene 1 Mafalda (originally from: Pyramid 1 Scene 2)
Scene 2 Tania Russof (Pyramid 1 Scene 4)
Scene 3 Regina Sipos (Pyramid 1 Scene 5)
Scene 4 Tania Russof, Angelica Mirai (Pyramid 2 Scene 4)
Scene 5 Ana, Shonna Lynn (Pyramid 2 Scene 5)
Scene 6 Nikki Anderson, Gina (Pyramid 3 Scene 4)

Disc 2:

Deleted Scene 1 Angelica Mirai, Sandra Dark (Pyramid 1 Scene 3)
Deleted Scene 2 Bianca, Judith Penn (Pyramid 3 Scene 3)
Pierre Woodman interview
Pyramid Backstage



Content:  Anal, DP/double penetration, Group, Outdoors





Notes:
(by erf32)

This double-DVD is the first of a new series of re-mastered older movies.
Originally released in three parts in 1996 as Private Gold The Pyramid 1, 2 & 3.
This new edition released January 2009. 
Disc 1 contains a re-mastered and edited version (ie a shorter version) of all 3 original Pyramid movies. 
Disc 2 has 2 other scenes, a Pierre Woodman interview (which ends abruptly), and a backstage film.

But for something labelled 'the ultimate collector's edition', it fails:
The 3 original movies totalled 16 scenes, but this new edition has only 8.
The DVD cover prominently shows the 14 girl harem orgy from the original Pyramid 2, but it is not on this DVD.
The DVD cover says Disc 1 is 2 hrs 25 minutes, when it is actually 2 hrs 9 minutes plus another 9 minutes of trailers.
The DVD cover says that it contains both Extra Scenes and Deleted Scenes, but it just has 2 so-called Deleted Scenes, but they aren't really 'deleted' because both are in the original films.
There are no production notes either, so you need copies of Private Gold The Pyramid 1, 2 & 3 to work out who is in which scene.








.
